Articles.Content: Fly yourself into orbit and hop out of your ship, then try to get back on it.
Umm please specify what you want us to do plz?
Are you saying just do an EVA walk? If you are . . . that's not much of a challenge.

Welcome to the forums! Don't forget some of us have been playing kerbal for a very long time, and will find this far to simple as a challenge.

For example, here is an Evas where I've left the ship. Done an orbit around the Mun, then returned to the ship. And the same during a real solar system mod apollo mission just for kicks.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

But don't be discouraged! Get to know the game, attempt some challenges yourself, and then you'll be ready to get involved in challenge creation.

Oh, also best to read the rules in the challenge rules sticky thread.

EVAs arent too hard if you know how the controls work for the kerbal on eva. You need to use R to engage jetpack, and then use wsad,shift,ctr to move around. Its same idea as any docking though, so basically move kerbal away from the ship, fly around aimlessly, crash into some panels, and then get back inside by flying near enough to grab the ladder near the doors with F key. If you feel truly pro, try to DEORBIT a kerbal and make him survive (its kinda possible if you do it right).
